414                .map(t -> t.stream()

418        instance.setDiscounted(com.commercetools.api.models.common.DiscountedPrice.deepCopy(template.getDiscounted()));
419        instance.setCustom(com.commercetools.api.models.type.CustomFields.deepCopy(template.getCustom()));
